content.html: Jack was one of the worst CEOs of all time. Indecisive (even when the company was engulfed in a political scandal), no clear vision or strategy for monetization, no control over his own company, and believed engineering a carnage was the best way to fix the mess he left behind.
content.value:
Jack was one of the worst CEOs of all time.

Indecisive (even when the company was engulfed in a political scandal), no clear vision or strategy for monetization, no control over his own company, and believed engineering a carnage was the best way to fix the mess he left behind.
